name: playwright-automation
description: **Edit a file, create a new file, and clone from Bitbucket in under 2 minutes**

scripts.allure:open:latest: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$latest = Get-ChildItem -Directory 'test-results' -Recurse -Filter 'allure-results-*' | Sort-Object LastWriteTime -Descending | Select-Object -First 1; if (!$latest) { Write-Error 'No allure-results-* folder found'; exit 1 }; Write-Host 'Serving:' $latest.FullName; & \"$env:APPDATA\npm\allure.cmd\" serve \"$latest.FullName\""
scripts.allure:generate:latest: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$latest = Get-ChildItem -Directory 'test-results' -Recurse -Filter 'allure-results-*' | Sort-Object LastWriteTime -Descending | Select-Object -First 1; if (!$latest) { Write-Error 'No allure-results-* folder found'; exit 1 }; $stamp = (Split-Path $latest.FullName -Leaf).Replace('allure-results-',''); $out = Join-Path $latest.Parent.FullName ('allure-report-' + $stamp); if (Test-Path $out) { Remove-Item $out -Recurse -Force }; Write-Host 'Generating HTML to:' $out; & \"$env:APPDATA\npm\allure.cmd\" generate \"$latest.FullName\" --clean -o \"$out\"; Start-Process \"$out\index.html\""
scripts.test:and-report: npm run test && npm run allure:generate:latest
